mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info (ID, title, localName, isFolder, isTopLev, lastEdit, cacheFor, insideOf) VALUES (#{ID}, #{title}, #{localName}, #{isFolder}, #{isTopLev}, #{lastEdit}, #{cacheFor}, #{insideOf});
